Package com.jcoinche.rules

Class GameRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcoinche.rules.GameRules

  • public class GameRules
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents all of the game rules of the coinche game This class contains the deck, the list of the players, the game board and so on It also manage the execution of a game by starting the rounds and counting the points of each team
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    uberti_l, grella_c
    See Also:
    Deck, Card, Player

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameRules​()
      The constructor set the variables that we use in all of our games and that we doesn't need to reset for each game.
